massage.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the action of pressing and rubbing someone’s body with your hands, to help them relax or to reduce pain in their muscles or joints
massage.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Why don’t you have a massage?
Joan gave me a gentle neck massage.
A full-body massage lasts around one hour.
massage.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to press and rub someone’s body with your hands, to help them relax or to reduce pain in their muscles
massage.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Gently massage the lotion into your skin.
massage.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to change official numbers or information in order to make them seem better than they are – used to show disapproval
massage.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Myers accused the government of deliberately massaging the unemployment figures.
